titleStmt.title: Haue vvith you to Saffron-vvalden. Or, Gabriell Harueys hunt is vp Containing a full answere to the eldest sonne of the halter-maker. Or, Nashe his confutation of the sinfull doctor. The mott or posie, in stead of omne tulit punctum: pacis fiducia nunquam. As much to say, as I sayd I would speake with him.
titleStmt.author: Nash, Thomas, 1567-1601.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
